metadata.titleEn: Qilian Mountains integrated observatory network: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network (an observation system of Meteorological elements gradient of Daman Superstation, 2020)
metadata.titleCn: 祁连山综合观测网：黑河流域地表过程综合观测网（大满超级站气象要素梯度观测系统-2020）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Heihe integrated observatory network obtained from an observation system of Meteorological elements gradient of Daman Superstation from January 1 to December 31, 2020. The site (100.372° E, 38.856° N) was located on a cropland (maize surface) in the Daman irrigation, which is near Zhangye city, Gansu Province. The elevation is 1556 m. The installation heights and orientations of different sensors and measured quantities were as follows: air temperature and humidity profile (AV-14TH;3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, and 40 m, towards north), wind speed and direction profile (windsonic; 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, and 40 m, towards north), air pressure (CS100; 2 m), rain gauge (TE525M; 2.5 m, 8 m in west of tower), four-component radiometer (PIR&PSP; 12 m, towards south), two infrared temperature sensors (IRTC3; 12 m, towards south, vertically downward), photosynthetically active radiation (LI190SB; 12 m, towards south, vertically upward; another four photosynthetically active radiation, PQS-1; two above the plants (12 m) and two below the plants (0.3 m), towards south, each with one vertically downward and one vertically upward), soil heat flux (HFP01SC; 3 duplicates with G1 below the vegetation; G2 and G3 between plants, -0.06 m), a TCAV averaging soil thermocouple probe (TCAV; -0.02, -0.04 m), soil temperature profile (AV-10T; 0, -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.8, -1.2, and -1.6 m), soil moisture profile (CS616; -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.8, -1.2, and -1.6 m).
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_3 m, Ta_5 m, Ta_10 m, Ta_15 m, Ta_20 m, Ta_30 m, and Ta_40 m; RH_3 m, RH_5 m, RH_10 m, RH_15 m, RH_20 m, RH_30 m, and RH_40 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_3 m, Ws_5 m, Ws_10 m, Ws_15 m, Ws_20 m, Ws_30 m, and Ws_40 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_3 m, WD_5 m, WD_10 m, WD_15 m, WD_20 m, WD_30m, and WD_40 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m^2), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), photosynthetically active radiation (PAR) (μmol/ (s m-2)), average soil temperature (TCAV, ℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, below the vegetation; Gs_2, and Gs_3, between plants) (W/m^2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm, Ts_10 cm, Ts_20 cm, Ts_40 cm, Ts_80 cm, Ts_120 cm, and Ts_160 cm) (℃), soil moisture (Ms_2 cm, Ms_4 cm, Ms_10 cm, Ms_20 cm, Ms_40 cm, Ms_80 cm, Ms_120 cm, and Ms_160 cm) (%, volumetric water content), above the plants photosynthetically active radiation of upward and downward (PAR_U_up and PAR_U_down) (μmol/ (s m-2)), and below the plants photosynthetically active radiation of upward and downward (PAR_D_up and PAR_D_down) (μmol/ (s m-2)).
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The AWS data were averaged over intervals of 10 min for a total of 144 records per day. The wind speed/direction during September 23 to October 17 were wrong because the malfunction of datalogger. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2020-6-10 10:30. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2020年1月1日至2020年12月31日黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游大满超级站气象要素梯度观测系统数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市大满灌区农田内，下垫面是玉米田。观测点的经纬度是100.3722E, 38.8555N，海拔1556m。风速/风向、空气温度、相对湿度传感器分别架设在3m、5m、10m、15m、20m、30m、40m处，共7层，朝向正北；气压计安装在2m处；翻斗式雨量计安装在塔西侧约8m处，架高2.5m；四分量辐射仪安装在12m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在12m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤热流板（自校正式）（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处，朝向正南距离塔体2m处，其中两块（Gs_2、Gs_3）埋设在棵间，一块（Gs_1）埋设在植株下面；平均土壤温度传感器TCAV埋设在地下2cm、4cm处，朝向正南，距离塔体2m处；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；光合有效辐射仪安装在12m处，探头朝向是垂直向上；另有四个光合有效辐射仪分别架设在冠层上方和冠层内，冠层上方安装在12m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个）、冠层内安装在0.3m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个）高处，朝向正南。
观测项目有：风速（WS_3m、WS_5m、WS_10m、WS_15m、WS_20m、WS_30m、WS_40m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_3m、WD_5m、WD_10m、WD_15m、WD_20m、WD_30m、WD_40m）(单位：度)、空气温湿度（Ta_3m、Ta_5m、Ta_10m、Ta_15m、Ta_20m、Ta_30m、Ta_40m和RH_3m、RH_5m、RH_10m、RH_15m、RH_20m、RH_30m、RH_40m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、平均土壤温度（TCAV）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_160cm）(单位：百分比)、土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_160cm）(单位：摄氏度) 、光合有效辐射（PAR）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)、冠层上向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_U_up、PAR_U_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)和冠层下向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_D_up、PAR_D_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；2020.9.23-10.17间由于采集器的问题，风速风向数据缺失；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2020-6-10 10:30。
黑河综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific features and measurement levels of meteorological elements in a dataset related to surface processes in a river basin?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与河流流域表面过程相关的数据集中，气象要素的具体特征和测量水平是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: wind speed and direction at 3m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m, 40m, air temperature at 3m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m, 40m, relative humidity at 3m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m, 40m, atmospheric pressure at 2m, precipitation with a tipping bucket rain gauge, radiation components at 12m, soil heat flux, soil moisture, soil temperature at depths from surface to 160cm
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 3米、5米、10米、15米、20米、30米、40米处的风速和风向，3米、5米、10米、15米、20米、30米、40米处的空气温度，3米、5米、10米、15米、20米、30米、40米处的相对湿度，2米处的大气压力，翻斗式雨量计测量的降水量，12米处的辐射分量，土壤热通量，土壤湿度，表面至160厘米深度的土壤温度。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many layers of wind speed and wind direction measurements are recorded in a dataset?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在一个数据集中记录了多少层风速和风向测量？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by '气象要素梯度观测系统' in the context of environmental data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在环境数据收集的背景下，“气象要素梯度观测系统”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: '气象要素梯度观测系统' refers to a meteorological element gradient observation system that involves the measurement of various atmospheric parameters such as wind speed, wind direction, air temperature, relative humidity, and pressure at different heights or depths. This system is used to monitor and analyze the vertical distribution and variation of these parameters in a specific area, providing comprehensive data for studying surface processes in the environment.
Definition.AnswerCn: '气象要素梯度观测系统'是指一种气象要素的梯度观测系统，涉及在不同高度或深度测量各种大气参数，如风速、风向、气温、相对湿度和气压。该系统用于监测和分析特定区域内这些参数的垂直分布和变化，为研究环境中的表面过程提供全面的数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods for meteorological element gradient observation systems compare to those used in soil temperature and moisture monitoring in terms of equipment placement and data accuracy?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 气象元素梯度观测系统的数据收集方法与土壤温度和湿度监测所使用的方法在设备放置和数据准确性方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The meteorological element gradient observation system uses sensors placed at various heights (3m to 40m) for wind speed, wind direction, air temperature, and relative humidity, ensuring a vertical profile of atmospheric conditions. In contrast, soil temperature and moisture monitoring employs sensors buried at multiple depths (from the surface to 160cm underground), focusing on the vertical soil profile. While both methods aim to capture gradient data, the meteorological system prioritizes atmospheric layers, whereas soil monitoring targets subsurface layers. Data accuracy is controlled by ensuring consistent data intervals and addressing issues like sensor malfunctions or data outliers.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 气象要素梯度观测系统使用安装在不同高度（3米到40米）的传感器来监测风速、风向、空气温度和相对湿度，以确保大气条件的垂直剖面。相比之下，土壤温度和湿度监测则采用埋设在多个深度（从地表到160厘米地下）的传感器，重点关注垂直土壤剖面。虽然这两种方法都旨在捕捉梯度数据，但气象系统优先考虑大气层，而土壤监测则针对地下层。数据准确性通过确保一致的数据间隔以及解决传感器故障或数据异常等问题来控制。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes might affect the accuracy and quality control of meteorological data collected in agricultural areas with complex terrain?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在复杂地形的农业区域收集的气象数据的准确性和质量控制可能受到哪些因素的影响？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The accuracy and quality control of meteorological data collected in agricultural areas with complex terrain can be affected by several factors, including data loss due to equipment failure, such as was experienced between September 23 and October 17, 2020, when wind speed and direction data were missing due to collector issues. Other factors include the presence of data that exceed physical meaning or instrument range, which must be removed, and the need for consistent date and time formatting. Additionally, there is a risk of having duplicate records or data marked with uncertainties, which need careful handling.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在复杂地形的农业区域收集的气象数据的准确性和质量控制可能受到多种因素的影响，包括由于设备故障导致的数据丢失。例如，在2020年9月23日至10月17日期间，由于采集器问题，风速和风向数据缺失。其他因素还包括超出物理意义或仪器范围的数据，这些数据必须被删除，以及需要一致的日期和时间格式。此外，还存在重复记录或标记有不确定性的数据的风险，这些数据需要谨慎处理。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of implementing a multi-layered meteorological observation system for measuring gradients of atmospheric variables in an agricultural field environment?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在农业田间环境中实施多层气象观测系统以测量大气变量梯度的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing a multi-layered meteorological observation system allows for detailed analysis of atmospheric variables such as wind speed, wind direction, and air temperature at different heights. This approach can lead to improved understanding of microclimatic conditions in agricultural fields, enhance predictions of weather impacts on crop growth, and potentially optimize agricultural practices by providing precise environmental data. However, challenges such as data quality maintenance, handling missing data, and ensuring consistent calibration of sensors across different heights need to be managed. The system's data processing and quality control involve ensuring complete daily data, eliminating duplicate records, and identifying anomalous data points, which require significant effort and expertise.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 实施多层气象观测系统可以对不同高度的气象变量，如风速、风向和气温进行详细分析。这种方法可以加深对农业领域微气候条件的理解，提高对天气对作物生长影响的预测，并通过提供精确的环境数据来优化农业实践。然而，数据质量维护、处理缺失数据以及确保不同高度传感器的一致校准等挑战需要得到管理。该系统的数据处理和质量控制涉及确保完整的每日数据、消除重复记录和识别异常数据点，这需要大量的努力和专业知识。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of implementing a multi-layer meteorological observation system in agricultural settings like cornfields?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在农业环境中（如玉米田）实施多层气象观测系统的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal of implementing a multi-layer meteorological observation system in agricultural settings such as cornfields is to comprehensively monitor various meteorological elements at different heights and depths, providing detailed data on wind speed, wind direction, air temperature, relative humidity, and other environmental factors. This data can help in understanding the interactions between the atmosphere and the agricultural environment, which is critical for optimizing agricultural practices, improving crop yield, and managing resources efficiently.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 在农业环境中，如玉米田，实施多层气象观测系统的目标是全面监测不同高度和深度的各种气象要素，提供关于风速、风向、气温、相对湿度和其他环境因素的详细数据。这些数据有助于理解大气与农业环境之间的相互作用，这对于优化农业实践、提高作物产量和有效管理资源至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to ensure the quality and accuracy of meteorological element gradient observation data collected in agricultural areas like cornfields?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在农业区域如玉米田中，确保气象元素梯度观测数据的质量和准确性所采用的程序有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure quality and accuracy, the data undergoes several processing and quality control steps: (1) Ensuring daily collection of 144 data points (every 10 minutes), with missing data marked as -6999; (2) Discarding duplicate records; (3) Removing data that is clearly outside physical significance or the instrument's range; (4) Marking data with potential issues in red; (5) Standardizing date and time format with both in the same column, for example, '2020-6-10 10:30'.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保数据的质量和准确性，数据经过几个处理和质量控制步骤：（1）确保每天收集144个数据点（每10分钟一次），缺失数据标记为-6999；（2）丢弃重复记录；（3）移除明显超出物理意义或仪器范围的数据；（4）将潜在问题的数据标记为红色；（5）标准化日期和时间格式，将两者放在同一列，例如'2020-6-10 10:30'。
